paragraphs.text:
exportSQL(sql="
select distinct a.pog, 
                a.sale_nm3_feed 
from `temp.nm` a 
left join `all(dProduct)` b 
on a.pog=b.pogId 
where lower(b.superCategory) like '%fmcg%' 
and a.sale_nm3_feed<12
order by a.sale_nm3_feed desc
",path="fmcg_nm",format="csv",partitions=1,header="true")
